rooms.description: A welcoming entrance that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring a clear path of entry.
Open space with seating area and views of the central courtyard; designed for social gatherings.
Functional kitchen area with ample storage and ventilation as per local building norms.
Cozy master bedroom ensuring privacy and optimal light from the courtyard orientation.
Additional bedroom with natural ventilation and sunlight.
Essential bathroom facility, designed for accessibility and privacy.

openings.details: Main entry door leading to the central courtyard; aligns with Vastu for positive energy flow.
Large windows facing east ensuring maximum morning light and adherence to Vastu.
Open access door that connects the kitchen with the central courtyard for a seamless flow.
Strategically placed windows ensuring proper ventilation and natural lighting in accordance with Vastu principles.

courtyard.description: Central open courtyard providing light, air circulation, and a focal point for the design in keeping with traditional Kerala Nalukettu style.
